author: itv.com
title: Behind the scenes: ITV News Central presents West Midlands show from New Street station
text: We were there earlier this week filming a celebratory flashdance Credit: ITV News Central Presenters Sameena and Genelle practice some lines Credit: ITV News Central Production specialist Carl and cameraman Bob check how the picture looks while Sameena checks scripts Credit: ITV News Central The team rehearse while production specialist Sarah times Credit: ITV News Central The team making some final checks before we go to air! Credit: ITV News Central Quick camera checks before we start filming Credit: ITV News Central Last updated Mon 21 Sep 2015 Read more 35 updates Birmingham New Street's grand opening Travel Birmingham Birmingham New Street
